attr.title: Painted Heart
attr.desc: Near the village of Appleby, a young and aspiring painter, Corbin, is prodded into the cathedralâ€™s painting to cleanse the vibrant world from cultural extinction by the Pestilence. To this day, nobody knows where the Pestilence had come from, and Corbin is even less sure how he can help restore the infected painting.
attr.inst: go to https://rmn.rmarchiv.de/ or https://archive.org/details/rpgmaker-net-game-archive(first site recommended) and search "Painted Heart" and download Painted Heart.exe. rename .exe to .zip and extract the gamedata. Place these extracted files into the "gamedata" folder.
